SEARCH
Package Users

Class Seller

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Seller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Seller extends User implements Serializable
Class containing information about a seller. This class is an extension of User and implements java.io.Serializable.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • productsToString

      public String productsToString()
      Returns a string of all the products the seller is selling. For each product, the title, quantity and price of the product is included.
      Returns:
      String containing products the seller is selling
